Chloral betaine (USAN, BAN) (aha aha Beta-Chlor, Somilan), nke a makwaara dị ka cloral betain (INN), bụ ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị. Ọ bụ Mead Johnson webatara ya na United States na 1963. Ọ bụ betaine complex na chloral hydrate, nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka usoro na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke chloral na hydrates nke a na-agbanwe n'ime trichloroethanol, nke na'ihi ọtụtụ ndị ji ụkwụ na ụdị nke ma ọ bụ mmetụta ya niile.
